title: New Hydro74 Typography
content:
It's been a while since I've opened up Fontographer and developed a few new type faces. So recently started to get involved with it again. Here are a few I put together. They are very display style.

More information is on my site if you want to see more.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [news\_stock2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102120728/http:/typophile.com/files/news_stock2.jpg) | 193.78 KB |
author: hydro74

comments.content: For those of you who haven't seen Joshua's work, be sure to check out his [custom logotypes](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102120728/http:/hydro74.com/H74/typetreatments.php).

I've always amazed by your lettering/typographic works.  
Are those typefaces commercial?
